trans-unit.source: Provides utility methods to compose and parse pack URI objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos de utilitário para compor e analisar os objetos do pacote de URI.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two pack URIs are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se duas pacote os URIs é equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: If both `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are `null`, ComparePackUri returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos os `firstPackUri` e `secondPackUri` são `null`, ComparePackUri devolve 0.

trans-unit.source: When comparing pack URIs, a null URI is always less than a non-null URI.
trans-unit.target: Quando a comparação com o pacote de URIs, um URI nulo é sempre menor do que um URI não nulo.

trans-unit.source: For cases where `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are both absolute pack URIs, ComparePackUri performs the comparison.
trans-unit.target: Nos casos em que `firstPackUri` e `secondPackUri` são ambos absoluto do pacote de URIs, ComparePackUri efetua a comparação.

trans-unit.source: The first pack URI.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro pacote URI.

trans-unit.source: The second pack URI.
trans-unit.target: O segundo pacote URI.

trans-unit.source: A signed integer indicating the relationship between firstPackUri and secondPackUri.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro com sinal que indica que a relação entre firstPackUri e secondPackUri .

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valor

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: Significado

trans-unit.source: Less than 0
trans-unit.target: Inferior a 0

trans-unit.source: firstPackUri is less than secondPackUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPackUriis less than secondPackUri.

trans-unit.source: firstPackUri is equivalent to secondPackUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPackUrié equivalente ao secondPackUri .

trans-unit.source: Greater than 0
trans-unit.target: Maior que 0

trans-unit.source: firstPackUri is greater than secondPackUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPackUrié maior do que secondPackUri .

trans-unit.source: Either firstPackUri or secondPackUri is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Either firstPackUri or secondPackUri is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: -or- Either firstPackUri or secondPackUri do not begin with a "pack://" scheme.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o firstPackUri ou secondPackUri não começar com um "pacote de: / /" esquema.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two package part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se duas parte do pacote [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: If both `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are `null`, ComparePartUri returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos os `firstPartUri` e `secondPartUri` são `null`, ComparePartUri devolve 0.

trans-unit.source: When comparing <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], a null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is always less than a non-null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ao comparar <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], um valor nulo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] é sempre menor do que um não-nulos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: For cases where `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are both relative <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> URIs, ComparePartUri performs the comparison.
trans-unit.target: Nos casos em que `firstPartUri` e `secondPartUri` são ambos relativo <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>URIs, ComparePartUri efetua a comparação.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the first <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] do primeiro <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the second <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] do segundo <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the relationship between firstPartUri and secondPartUri.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a relação entre firstPartUri e secondPartUri .

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valor

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: Significado

trans-unit.source: Less than 0
trans-unit.target: Inferior a 0

trans-unit.source: firstPartUri is less than secondPartUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPartUriis less than secondPartUri.

trans-unit.source: firstPartUri is equivalent to secondPartUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPartUrié equivalente ao secondPartUri .

trans-unit.source: Greater than 0
trans-unit.target: Maior que 0

trans-unit.source: firstPartUri is greater than secondPartUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPartUrié maior do que secondPartUri .

trans-unit.source: firstPartUri or secondPartUri is not a valid part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] syntax.
trans-unit.target: firstPartUriou secondPartUri não faz parte válida [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] sintaxe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new pack URI that points to a package.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo pacote de URI que aponta para um pacote.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`não pode ser especificado como `null` ou estar vazio.

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for Create.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte ilustra os cenários de exemplo para criar.

trans-unit.source: |`packageUri`|Returned pack URI| |------------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process.
trans-unit.target: | `packageUri`| Devolveu pack URI | |------------------|-----------------------| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg| | ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc | pack://ftp:, ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |File:///d:/Packages/mypackage2.pkg| pack://file: //application d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| Composição de um pacote de URI é um processo de vários passo.

trans-unit.source: For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um passo que formam um pack URI é para substituir os carateres de barra (/) da `packageUri` com vírgulas (,).

trans-unit.source: For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre a conversão de cadeia e como são formados URLs de pacote, consulte o apêndice A.4 "Exemplos de conversão da cadeia" e apêndice B.3 "Composição de URI para o pacote" na especificação Open Packaging Conventions disponível para transferência em [especificações e transfere licença](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: The URI of the referenced <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O URI do elemento referenciado <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The pack URI for the referenced by the given packageUri.
trans-unit.target: O pacote de URI para o referenciado pelo fornecido packageUri .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
trans-unit.target: packageUriis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: packageUriNão é um URI absoluto.

trans-unit.source: Creates a pack URI given a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package.
trans-unit.target: Cria um pacote de URI fornecido um <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de uma parte do pacote.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` may not be specified as null or empty.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`não pode ser especificado como nulo ou estar vazio.

trans-unit.source: If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package.
trans-unit.target: Se `partUri` é `null`, devolvido pack URI aponta para o pacote.

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for the Create method.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte ilustra os cenários de exemplo para o método de criação.

trans-unit.source: |`packageUri`|`partUri`|Returned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process.
trans-unit.target: | `packageUri`|`partUri`| Devolveu pack URI | |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/page2.xaml| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/a/page4.xaml| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%41/%61.xml| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%25XY.xml| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg | **nulo**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg| | ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc |/a/mydoc.xaml| pack://ftp:, ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |File:///d:/Packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.XAML| pack://file: //application d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| Composição de um pacote de URI é um processo de vários passo.

trans-unit.source: For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um passo que formam um pack URI é para substituir os carateres de barra (/) da `packageUri` com vírgulas (,).

trans-unit.source: For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre a conversão de cadeia e como são formados URLs de pacote, consulte o apêndice A.4 "Exemplos de conversão da cadeia" e apêndice B.3 "Composição de URI para o pacote" na especificação Open Packaging Conventions disponível para transferência em [especificações e transfere licença](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> in the package.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] do <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> no pacote.

trans-unit.source: The pack URI of the given <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O pacote de URI da determinada <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
trans-unit.target: packageUriis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: packageUriNão é um URI absoluto.

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri is not a valid part URI syntax.
trans-unit.target: - ou - partUri não é uma sintaxe URI da parte válido.

trans-unit.source: Creates a pack URI given a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package, and a "#" fragment to append.
trans-unit.target: Cria um pacote de URI fornecido um <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de uma parte no pacote e um fragmento de "#" a acrescentar.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`não pode ser especificado como `null` ou estar vazio.

trans-unit.source: If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package.
trans-unit.target: Se `partUri` é `null`, devolvido pack URI aponta para o pacote.

trans-unit.source: `fragment` cannot be an empty string but can be specified as `null`.
trans-unit.target: `fragment`não pode ser uma cadeia vazia, mas pode ser especificado como `null`.

trans-unit.source: When not specified as `null`, the `fragment` string must begin with a '#' character.
trans-unit.target: Quando não especificado como `null`, a `fragment` cadeia tem de começar com um caráter '#'.

trans-unit.source: For more information of the syntax of `fragment` references, see Section 3.5 "Fragment" of [RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a sintaxe de `fragment` referências, consulte a secção 3.5 "Fragmento" de [RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt).

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for the Create method.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte ilustra os cenários de exemplo para o método de criação.

trans-unit.source: |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|Returned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml|#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml|#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml|#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null**|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml|**null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml|#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process.
trans-unit.target: | `packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`| Devolveu pack URI | |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/page1.xaml|#intro| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/page2.xaml| **nulo**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/a/page4.xaml| **nulo**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%41/%61.xml| **nulo**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%25XY.xml| **nulo**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/a/page5.xaml|#summary| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| | http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04 |/page1.xaml|#intro| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg | **nulo**|**nulo**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg| | ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc |/a/mydoc.xaml| **nulo**| pack://ftp:, ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |File:///d:/Packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.XAML|#xref| pack://file: //application d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Composição de um pacote de URI é um processo de vários passo.

trans-unit.source: For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um passo que formam um pack URI é para substituir os carateres de barra (/) da `packageUri` com vírgulas (,).

trans-unit.source: For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre a conversão de cadeia e como são formados URLs de pacote, consulte o apêndice A.4 "Exemplos de conversão da cadeia" e apêndice B.3 "Composição de URI para o pacote" na especificação Open Packaging Conventions disponível para transferência em [especificações e transfere licença](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> in the package.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] do <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> no pacote.

trans-unit.source: A "#" reference identifying an element within the package part.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência de "#" identificar um elemento a parte do pacote.

trans-unit.source: The pack URI that identifies the specified package, package part, and fragment.
trans-unit.target: O URI que identifique o pacote especificado, a parte do pacote e o fragmento do pacote.

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
trans-unit.target: packageUriis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: packageUriNão é um URI absoluto.

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri is not a valid part URI syntax.
trans-unit.target: - ou - partUri não é uma sintaxe URI da parte válido.

trans-unit.source: -or- fragment is empty or does begin with "#".
trans-unit.target: - ou - fragment está vazio ou começar com "#".

trans-unit.source: Creates a formatted <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
trans-unit.target: Cria um formatado <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> is always referenced from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> root.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>sempre referenciado a partir de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>raiz.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> URI is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: O devolvido <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>URI é um caminho absoluto que sempre começa por "/" e está em conformidade com a sintaxe definida no [especificação Open de convenções de empacotamento](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for CreatePartUri.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte ilustra os cenários de exemplo para CreatePartUri.

trans-unit.source: |`partUri`|Returned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |picture1.jpg|/picture1.jpg| |/picture2.jpg|/picture2.jpg| |a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml| |/b/bar.xaml|/b/bar.xaml|
trans-unit.target: | `partUri`| Devolvido o URI da parte | |---------------|-----------------------| |picture1.jpg|/picture1.jpg| |/picture2.jpg|/picture2.jpg| |a/mydoc.XAML|/a/mydoc.XAML| |/b/bar.XAML|/b/bar.XAML|

trans-unit.source: The URI of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> within the package.
trans-unit.target: O URI do <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> no pacote.

trans-unit.source: A formatted <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
trans-unit.target: Um formato <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI.

trans-unit.source: Returns the normalized form of a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a forma normalizada de uma determinada <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI.

trans-unit.source: GetNormalizedPartUri normalizes `partUri` by case-folding to uppercase (<xref:System.String.ToUpperInvariant%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) and returning the result.
trans-unit.target: Normaliza GetNormalizedPartUri `partUri` por caso-subconjuntos de validação em maiúsculas (<xref:System.String.ToUpperInvariant%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) e o resultado a devolver.</xref:System.String.ToUpperInvariant%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI to normalize.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI para normalizar.

trans-unit.source: The normalized form of the given partUri.
trans-unit.target: A forma normalizada da determinada partUri .

trans-unit.source: partUri is .
trans-unit.target: partUriis .

trans-unit.source: Returns the inner URI that points to the entire package of a specified pack URI.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o URI interno que aponta para o pacote completo de um URI de pacote especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for GetPackageUri.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte ilustra os cenários de exemplo para GetPackageUri.

trans-unit.source: |`packUri`|Returned Package URI| |---------------|--------------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|
trans-unit.target: | `packUri`| Devolvido o URI do pacote | |---------------|--------------------------| | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml| http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz | | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml| http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage | | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg| http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg | | pack://ftp:, ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg| ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc | | pack://file: //application d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|

trans-unit.source: The pack URI from which to return the URI of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O pacote de URI do qual devolver o URI do <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The URI of the from the specified packUri.
trans-unit.target: O URI do de especificado packUri .

trans-unit.source: Returns the URI of a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> within a specified pack URI.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o URI de um <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> dentro de um URI de pacote especificado.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> URI is relative to the package root and is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: O devolvido <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>URI relativo na raiz do pacote e é um caminho absoluto sempre que começa com "/" e está em conformidade com a sintaxe definida no [especificação Open de convenções de empacotamento](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for GetPartUri.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte ilustra os cenários de exemplo para GetPartUri.

trans-unit.source: |`packUri`|Returned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|null| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml|
trans-unit.target: | `packUri`| Devolvido o URI da parte | |---------------|-----------------------| | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml| | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml| | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg|null| | pack://ftp:, ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg| | pack://file: //application d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml|

trans-unit.source: The pack URI from which to return the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
trans-unit.target: O pacote de URI do qual pretende devolver a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI.

trans-unit.source: The URI of the in the given packUri, or if packUri points to a package instead of a .
trans-unit.target: The URI of the in the given packUri, or if packUri points to a package instead of a .

trans-unit.source: Returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the relationship part associated with a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] da peça relação associada um <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `partUri` must identify either the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> ("/") or a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that is not a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> part.
trans-unit.target: `partUri`tem de identificar um o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>("/") ou um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>que não uma <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>Peça</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts, see Section 9.3 "Relationships" in the Open Packaging Conventions Specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>peças, consulte a secção 9.3 "Relações" na especificação de convenções de empacotamento Open disponível para transferência em [especificações e transfere licença](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*> of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> to return the URI for the associated <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*>do <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> para devolver o URI para associada <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*>

trans-unit.source: The URI of the part associated with the identified by partUri.
trans-unit.target: O URI do parte associado a identificado por partUri .

trans-unit.source: partUri is .
trans-unit.target: partUriis .

trans-unit.source: partUri syntax is not valid for a package part URI.
trans-unit.target: partUrisintaxe não é válida para uma URI de parte do pacote.

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri is an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: - ou - partUri é um URI absoluto.

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri references a relationship part.
trans-unit.target: - ou - partUri referencia uma parte de relação.

trans-unit.source: Returns the relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] between two specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Devolve o caminho relativo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] entre duas especificado <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for GetRelativeUri.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte ilustra os cenários de exemplo para GetRelativeUri.

trans-unit.source: |`sourcePartUri`|`targetPartUri`|Returned relative URI| |---------------------|---------------------|---------------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg|picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/picture.jpg|../picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg|../images/picture.jpg|
trans-unit.target: | `sourcePartUri`|`targetPartUri`| Devolvido o URI relativo | |---------------------|---------------------|---------------------------| |/mydoc/Markup/page.XML|/mydoc/Markup/Picture.jpg|Picture.jpg| | / mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/picture.jpg|... /Picture.jpg| | / mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg|... /Images/Picture.jpg|

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the source part.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] da peça de origem.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target part.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] da peça de destino.

trans-unit.source: The relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from sourcePartUri to targetPartUri.
trans-unit.target: The relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from sourcePartUri to targetPartUri.

trans-unit.source: sourcePartUri or targetPartUri is .
trans-unit.target: sourcePartUrior targetPartUri is .

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> from the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*>do <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> com uma determinada [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> property of a relationship part must identify either the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A> ("/") or a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that is not a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>propriedade de uma parte de relação tem de identificar um o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A>("/") ou um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>que não um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the package part "/files/document.xaml" is the source owner of the relationship part "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", calling GetSourcePartUriFromRelationshipPartUri with the `relationshipPartUri` parameter of "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" returns the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> of "/files/document.xaml".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a parte do pacote "/ files/document.xaml" é o proprietário da origem da peça de relação "/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", chamar GetSourcePartUriFromRelationshipPartUri com o `relationshipPartUri` parâmetro de "/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" devolve o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>de "/ files/document.xaml".</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the relationship part to return the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> from.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] da peça de relação para devolver o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*>de.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*>

trans-unit.source: The of the from the relationship with the specified relationshipPartUri.
trans-unit.target: O do da relação especificado com relationshipPartUri .

trans-unit.source: relationshipPartUri is .
trans-unit.target: relationshipPartUriis .

trans-unit.source: relationshipPartUri is an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: relationshipPartUrié absoluto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: -or- relationshipPartUri syntax is not valid for a .
trans-unit.target: - ou - relationshipPartUri sintaxe não é válida para um .

trans-unit.source: -or- relationshipPartUri does not reference a relationship part.
trans-unit.target: - ou - relationshipPartUri não referencia uma parte de relação.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> of the relationship part references another relationship part (not valid, see Remarks).
trans-unit.target: - ou - <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> da relação parte faz referência a outra parte de relação (não é válido, consulte observações).

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> part.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se uma determinada [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] é o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de um <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> parte.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to check for a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> part.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] para procurar um <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> parte.

trans-unit.source: if partUri identifies a part; otherwise, .

trans-unit.target: partUriis .

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri is an invalid syntax.
trans-unit.target: - ou - partUri é inválido sintaxe.

trans-unit.source: Returns a part URI given a source part URI and a URI with a relative path to a target part.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um URI fornecido um URI da parte de origem da parte e um URI com um caminho relativo para uma peça de destino.

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for ResolvePartUri.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte ilustra os cenários de exemplo para ResolvePartUri.

trans-unit.source: |`sourcePartUri`|`targetUri`|Returned URI| |---------------------|-----------------|------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|images/picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|./picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../picture.jpg|/mydoc/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../images/picture.jpg|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg| |/|images/picture.jpg|/images/picture.jpg|
trans-unit.target: | `sourcePartUri`|`targetUri`| URI de devolveu | |---------------------|-----------------|------------------| |/mydoc/Markup/page.XML|Picture.jpg|/mydoc/Markup/Picture.jpg| |/mydoc/Markup/page.XML|Images/Picture.jpg|/mydoc/Markup/Images/Picture.jpg| | / mydoc/markup/page.xml|. /Picture.jpg|/mydoc/Markup/Picture.jpg| | / mydoc/markup/page.xml|... /Picture.jpg|/mydoc/Picture.jpg| | / mydoc/markup/page.xml|... /Images/Picture.jpg|/mydoc/Images/Picture.jpg| |/|Images/Picture.jpg|/Images/Picture.jpg|

trans-unit.source: The URI of the source part, or "/" to designate the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> root.
trans-unit.target: O URI da parte de origem, ou "/" para designar o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> raiz.

trans-unit.source: The relative URI to the target part.
trans-unit.target: O URI relativo para a parte de destino.

trans-unit.source: The URI of the target part resolved between the specified SourcePartUri and the targetUri parameters.
trans-unit.target: O URI da parte do destino resolvido entre especificado SourcePartUri e targetUri parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: sourcePartUri or targetUri is .
trans-unit.target: sourcePartUrior targetUri is .

trans-unit.source: sourcePartUri is not a valid part URI.
trans-unit.target: sourcePartUriNão é um URI da parte válido.

trans-unit.source: -or- targetUri is not a valid relative URI.
trans-unit.target: - ou - targetUri não é um URI relativo válido.

trans-unit.source: Defines the pack URI scheme name "pack".
trans-unit.target: Define o pacote de pacote"nome de esquema URI".
